"Powerful Corrupted Core!?":
"Good afternoon boss.
I'm currently studying about corrupted cores
and those things are really troublesome.
What's worse is that I've heard that they recently
found an unknown type of corrupted core.
Had you heard that? I just overheard that from
one of the instructors but I don't really know anything
about it. If I can, I'd like to collect some reports on it!
*In the Coast area, Hostiles of Lv.61 or higher
with a corrupted core."

"先輩、こんにちは。
今、侵食核のことを勉強してるんですけど
とってもやっかいなものですね、これ。
しかも最近、今までにないタイプの侵食核が
見つかったそうですね。ご存じでしたか？
教官からチラッと話を聞いただけで
どんなものなのか全然わからないですけど
できればレポートをまとめたいんです！
※Lv.61以上の海岸エリアにいる
侵食核付きエネミーが対象"
